LanguageData.Messtin.label: 반합
LanguageData.Messtin.description: 밥을 짓거나 간단한 조리를 할때에 쓰인다.\n최저급의 설비밖에 없기 때문에 조리속도가 30%저하한다.
LanguageData.Messtin_Blueprint.label: 반합(blueprint)
LanguageData.Messtin_Blueprint_Install.label: 반합 (blueprint)
LanguageData.Messtin_Frame.label: 반합 (building)
LanguageData.Messtin_Frame.description: 밥을 짓거나 간단한 조리를 할때에 쓰인다.\n최저급의 설비밖에 없기 때문에 조리속도가 30%저하한다.
LanguageData.IronPot.label: 가마
LanguageData.IronPot.description: 밥을 짓거나 국을 만들 때에 편리한 조리대.
LanguageData.IronPot_Blueprint.label: 가마 (blueprint)
LanguageData.IronPot_Blueprint_Install.label: 가마 (blueprint)
LanguageData.IronPot_Frame.label: 가마 (building)
LanguageData.IronPot_Frame.description: 밥을 짓거나 국을 만들 때에 편리한 조리대.
LanguageData.RiceCooker.label: 취반기
LanguageData.RiceCooker.description: 밥을 짓거나 국을 만들때에 편리한 조리대.\n최신초리기구가 갖추어져 조리속도가 30%상승한다.
LanguageData.RiceCooker_Blueprint.label: 취반기 (blueprint)
LanguageData.RiceCooker_Blueprint_Install.label: 취반기 (blueprint)
LanguageData.RiceCooker_Frame.label: 취반기 (building)
LanguageData.RiceCooker_Frame.description: 밥을 짓거나 국을 만들때에 편리한 조리대.\n최신초리기구가 갖추어져 조리속도가 30%상승한다.
LanguageData.ZPIrori.label: 囲炉裏
LanguageData.ZPIrori.description: 日本家屋に設けられる炉の一種で、床の一部を四角に切り抜いて火をたく場所。主に暖房と調理が目的だが人々の集いの場所でもありリラクゼーションをもたらしてくれる。
LanguageData.ZPIrori_Blueprint.label: 囲炉裏 (blueprint)
LanguageData.ZPIrori_Blueprint_Install.label: 囲炉裏 (blueprint)
LanguageData.ZPIrori_Frame.label: 囲炉裏 (building)
LanguageData.ZPIrori_Frame.description: 日本家屋に設けられる炉の一種で、床の一部を四角に切り抜いて火をたく場所。主に暖房と調理が目的だが人々の集いの場所でもありリラクゼーションをもたらしてくれる。
LanguageData.CookingTable.label: Cooking table
LanguageData.CookingTable.description: Cooking table for preparing.\nSpecializing in seasoning and food processing.
LanguageData.CookingTable_Blueprint.label: Cooking table(blueprint)
LanguageData.CookingTable_Blueprint_Install.label: Cooking table(blueprint)
LanguageData.CookingTable_Frame.label: Cooking table(building)
LanguageData.CookingTable_Frame.description: Cooking table for preparing.\nSpecializing in seasoning and food processing.
LanguageData.PestleAndMortar.label: Kineusu
LanguageData.PestleAndMortar.description: Kine(Pestle) and Usu(mortar) for making mochi. You can make mochi in large quantities.
LanguageData.PestleAndMortar_Blueprint.label: Kineusu(blueprint)
LanguageData.PestleAndMortar_Blueprint_Install.label: Kineusu (blueprint)
LanguageData.PestleAndMortar_Frame.label: Kineusu(building)
LanguageData.PestleAndMortar_Frame.description: Kine(Pestle) and Usu(mortar) for making mochi. You can make mochi in large quantities.
LanguageData.Nukadoko.label: Nukadoko
LanguageData.Nukadoko.description: A large bottle that can make a large amount of Nukaduke(rice bran pickles) that are preserved foods.
LanguageData.Nukadoko_Blueprint.label: Nukadoko(blueprint)
LanguageData.Nukadoko_Blueprint_Install.label: Nukadoko(blueprint)
LanguageData.Nukadoko_Frame.label: Nukadoko(building)
LanguageData.Nukadoko_Frame.description: A large bottle that can make a large amount of Nukaduke(rice bran pickles) that are preserved foods.
